author: shamchimohammad

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.openai.com;
